timeline.bodyText: Wouldn't some sort of await be better? Something like we do in telegram? https://github.com/apache/camel-quarkus/blob/master/integration-tests/telegram/src/test/java/org/apache/camel/quarkus/component/telegram/it/TelegramTest.java#L150-L161
